casebody.data:
Joel Thomas PIERCE, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 12988. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. April 20, 1950. Joel Thomas Pierce, in pro. per. Wm. T. Morton, Asst. U. S. Atty., Augusta, Ga., Green B. Everitt, Asst. U. S. Atty., Savannah, Ga., J. Saxton Daniel, U. S. Atty., Savannah, Ga., for appellee.

Before HUTCHESON, Chief Judge', and McCORD and WALLER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the lower court is Affirmed.
